entry.title: Telecom Giant Telefónica Launches Solana-Powered Helium Mobile Hotspots
entry.summary: Nova Labs has teamed with Telefónica to deploy the wireless hotspots, which are incentivized with crypto tokens on Solana, in Mexico.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Are Pulling in Billions—But Crypto Stocks Are Taking a Beating
entry.summary: Bitcoin-related stocks like Coinbase and MicroStrategy are down as the price of the biggest cryptocurrency takes a heavy hit this month.

entry.title: Gala Games Shuns Creator for Talking Too Much About Token Prices
entry.summary: Gala Games supports content creators, but doesn't want them focused on token prices and ROI. Can "moonboy" talk pose a real legal threat?

entry.title: SEC Delays Decision on BlackRock's Spot Ethereum ETF Application
entry.summary: The SEC has delayed its decision on the long-awaited investment vehicle.

entry.title: Donald Trump’s Ethereum Wallet Holds $1.1M in MAGA Meme Coin
entry.summary: Trump sold ETH last month, but he didn’t dump TRUMP. Now the Ethereum-based meme coin has skyrocketed in value.

entry.title: Crypto Billionaire Arthur Hayes Says Bitcoin Could Fall to $30,000 in 2024
entry.summary: The exCEO of Bitmex thinks that a series of wars and the need to finance them are among reasons to expect a steep crypto price correction before the next bull run.

entry.title: Self-Described Bitcoin Inventor Craig Wright Offers to Settle IP Case
entry.summary: Wright proposes a settlement in the dispute over Bitcoin’s creation, offering concessions to COPA ahead of the February 5 trial.

entry.title: Trash-Fueled BTC Mining w/ Chris Bennet
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Chris Bennet from Spacestation Investments.
They discuss: - Mining BTC with energy generated from landfills - How to increase deal-flow - Running an agency vs running a fund

entry.title: Bitcoin Is Poised for Another Run—If Fed Cuts Rates: Analysts
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum draw more investor interest amid ETF launches and eased monetary policies. Is crypto set to rise again?

entry.title: Crypto Lender Nexo Sues Bulgaria for $3 Billion After Beating 'Politically Motivated' Investigation
entry.summary: Nexo claims that it would have closed an $8 billion raise if not for Bulgaria's office raid trashing the company's reputation.

entry.title: The Biggest Nintendo Games Still Coming Before the Switch 2
entry.summary: UPDATED: The Nintendo Switch 2 is reportedly on the horizon, but original Switch owners will have promising games ahead.

entry.title: Bitcoin Bounces as Grayscale Slows Down Sales
entry.summary: Bitcoin has jumped above $40,000 again after taking a big hit at the start of the week. Can we thank Grayscale for the reprieve?

entry.title: Gaming Tokens Rebound as Ronin and Beam Post Double-Digit Gains
entry.summary: Ronin continues its recent rise amid Pixels game hype, while Beam and Immutable are bouncing back after a rough few weeks.

entry.title: How Coinbase Earn Makes Staking Simple—and Secure
entry.summary: Coinbase's staking program aims to be a “one-stop shop” for crypto staking, the firm's staking product lead told Decrypt.

entry.title: SEC's Hester Peirce: Bitcoin ETF 'Lesson Will Certainly Stick'
entry.summary: The SEC Commissioner doubled down on remarks criticizing the regulator's handling of spot Bitcoin ETF approvals, in a recent interview.

entry.title: 'Palworld' Roadmap Revealed—Huge Upgrades Are Coming
entry.summary: The "Pokémon with guns" game is an enormous hit. Here's a look at the bug fixes and new modes and features coming to Palworld.

entry.summary: Solana meme coin Dogwifhat (WIF) soared as trading began on crypto exchange Bitget early Wednesday morning.

entry.summary: The MailerLite email marketing service says an employee was phished and allowed internal access to its systems.

entry.title: Are Mt. Gox Creditor Gears Turning? Rumors Rattle Bitcoin Market
entry.summary: Bitcoin fell after reports emerged saying Mt. Gox has started to repay its creditors—dragging the rest of the cryptocurrency market with it.

entry.title: Palworld Isn’t a Crypto Game—But It Is a Vampire Attack on Pokémon
entry.summary: It's "Pokémon with guns" and it's the hottest thing in gaming right now. Why Palworld is the video game equivalent of a crypto vampire attack.

entry.title: Is a Crypto Token Itself a Security? SEC Can't Make Up Its Mind
entry.summary: Apparent contradictions in the SEC’s arguments in the Coinbase and Binance lawsuits expose mounting legal troubles for the regulator, experts say.

entry.title: Jupiter Launching Solana Meme Coin With An Airdrop Even Bigger Than JUP
entry.summary: Waiting for the Jupiter airdrop? Jupiter’s launchpad will deploy a Solana meme coin to even more wallets this week.

entry.summary: Doom meets DOGE—and one pseudonymous Dogecoin enthusiast believes the chain could eventually host its own gaming ecosystem. Here’s why.

entry.summary: Here’s how Magic Eden plans to incentivize NFT traders with not only its Diamonds program, but the Non-Fungible DAO’s NFT token.

entry.summary: Social gaming platform Gamee saw 600 million of its tokens liquidated overnight, plunging GMEE’s price. Here's what we know so far.

entry.summary: As the price of Bitcoin continues to drop, the broader crypto market is taking a hit—and Ethereum and Solana are having a rough week.

entry.summary: Polymer, an Ethereum layer 2 that provides interoperability as a service, has raised a $23 million Series A from Coinbase Ventures, Placeholder, and more.

entry.summary: Rollbit will sponsor FaZe Clan’s top-ranked Counter-Strike 2 esports team, albeit only outside of North America.

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Generative Art Across Mediums: Artists Discuss the Evolving Space
entry.summary: In this panel discussion from Rug Radio's R Haus at Art Basel Miami 2023, Sofia Garcia, Ismail Tazi, Emily Edelman, and Aleksandra Art discuss the expanding generative art space—and why "generative" doesn't necessarily have to mean digital.

entry.title: The AI Coin to Rule Them All with Mike Grantis
entry.summary: Reza is joined by Mike Grantis from Contango Digital to discuss - The AI coin to rule them all - The Solana Ecosystem - What's next for Solana airdrops

entry.title: Conversation With Snowfro: Bringing 'Chromie Squiggle' #8107 to the Physical Space
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO and "Chromie Squiggle" project creator Erick "snowfro" Calderon spoke with Benny Redbeard Gross at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel 2023, to discuss how and why "Chromie Squiggle" NFT #8107 was given a special edition print run in collaboration with Avant Arte.

entry.title: Don't Underestimate Mobile Gaming: Qualcomm's Matthew Grossman
entry.summary: Qualcomm product marketing manager Matthew Grossman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why mobile esports is exploding in popularity around the world—and dispels some of the misconceptions around mobile gaming.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: This Is the 'Calm Before the Storm', Says ETF Analyst
entry.summary: Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas joins Farokh Sarmad, Michael Anderson, and Ovie Faruq on the FOMO Hour to share the latest intel on the looming approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF, what might happen when the very different worlds of TradFi and crypto collide, and his insights on “Genslish,” the unique and strategic language of SEC chair Gary Gensler.

entry.title: Losing 1500 BTC on Mt Gox and the Problem with Women in Web3
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Brooke Lacey!
They discuss: - Making and losing generational wealth - Trauma Bond - Women in Web3 - The Problem with WAGMI

entry.title: ESL Faceit Group Exploring Blockchain 'Opportunistically,' Says Exec
